original_title: Neuschwanstein Linderhof Herrenchiemsee Castles and Life of King Ludwig II
overview: I want to remain an eternal mystery to myself and the others ... The myth of King Ludwig II is unbroken even more than 125 years after his death. The 85-minute documentary, released in 2012 with beautiful aerial photographs, provides detailed information on the genesis and background of the royal palaces of Neuschwanstein, Linderhof, Herrenchiemsee and Hohenschwangau.
title: Neuschwanstein Linderhof Herrenchiemsee Castles and Life of King Ludwig II
